actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Mr. McCollum. Petition No: 103-10.

official_title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 2872) to prevent and punish crime, to strengthen the rights of crime victims, to assist State and local efforts against crime, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 2872 (crime prevention and control).

titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 2872) to prevent and punish crime, to strengthen the rights of crime victims, to assist State and local efforts against crime, and for other purposes.
